    • getAllMessengerContacts

      public Map<String,List<MsgProviderData>> getAllMessengerContacts(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo)
      All providers contacts (potential Oscar Messenger Members) from the local Oscar AND all the Integrated clinics that are connected. This list is used in the Messenger Configuration to present potential members that can be enrolled into the Oscar Messenger system.
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo -
      Returns:
      Mapinvalid input: '<'String, List invalid input: '<' MsgProviderData>>

    • getAllLocalMessengerContactList

      public List<MsgProviderData> getAllLocalMessengerContactList(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo)

      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo -
      Returns:
      List

    • getAllRemoteMessengerContactList

      public Map<String,List<MsgProviderData>> getAllRemoteMessengerContactList(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo)
      All providers contacts (potential Oscar Messenger Members) from ALL remote Integrated Facilities (remote clinics). This list is used in the Messenger Configuration to present potential members that can be enrolled into the Oscar Messenger system. Sorted by facility name
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo -
      Returns:

    • removeGroupMember

      public boolean removeGroupMember(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, ContactIdentifier contactIdentifier)
      Remove a messenger member from any given group. Does not remove member from other groups or from the main messenger membership registry.
